scripts.build: npm run clean && tsc --build && npm run copy-static && npx tailwindcss -i ./src/public/css/input.css -o ./dist/public/css/output.css --minify
scripts.dev: npm run clean && tsc --build && concurrently "tsc --build --watch" "npm run copy-static:watch" "npx tailwindcss -i ./src/public/css/input.css -o ./dist/public/css/output.css --watch" "nodemon ./dist/index.js"
